product_name: Deuter Futura Vario Pro 45+10 SL Pack - Women's
long_description: The spacious Deuter Futura Vario Pro 45 + 10 SL Pack for women has an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable and gender-specific comfort for backpacking trips. VARIFIT adjustable shoulder harness customizes your individual fit by making precise torso length adjustments. VariFlex pivoting hipbelt with compact hip fins follows every movement and helps you keep your balance on difficult terrain. AIRCOMFORT ventilated back system helps reduce perspiration by up to 25%. Height-adjustable lid accommodates overflow loads. Hydration compatible (reservoir sold separately). Spring steel wire design and 2 horizontal stays are reinforced with a polyethylene framesheet for superb load transfer. Wet laundry compartment; 2 zippered hipbelt pockets; bellowed side pockets; stretch side pockets; lid compartment with internal valuables pocket; zippered front pocket. Compression straps; ice-tool/trekking-pole attachment loops; top-lid attachment rings. The Deuter Futura Vario Pro 45 + 10 SL Pack features U-shaped front panel access, bottom compartment access with internal zip divider and an integrated, detachable rain cover.
short_description: The spacious Deuter Futura Vario Pro 45 + 10 SL Pack for women has an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable and gender-specific comfort for backpacking trips.
